message.entry: KFactor cannot be all-zero.
The minimum and maximum frequencies for a restricted Jakes Doppler spectrum must be spaced by more than 1/50.
The minimum and maximum frequencies for an asymmetric Jakes Doppler spectrum must be spaced by more than 1/50.

NormalizedCenterFrequencies and PowerGains of a bi-Gaussian Doppler spectrum must be chosen so that the elements in the vector abs(NormalizedCenterFrequencies) + PowerGains*sqrt(2*log(2))) must not be greater than 1.
AveragePathGains and PathDelays must have the same length.
The length of DopplerSpectrum must be 1 or the same as the length of PathDelays.
KFactor must be a scalar or a row vector of the same length as PathDelays.
DirectPathDopplerShift must have the same size as KFactor.
DirectPathInitialPhase must have the same size as KFactor.
When the maximum Doppler shift is zero, setting DirectPathDopplerShift to a non-zero value has no effect on the channel.
When the maximum Doppler shift is zero, setting DirectPathInitialPhase to a non-zero value has no effect on the channel.
MaximumDopplerShift times cutoff frequency factor(s) must be less than SampleRate/10.
Oversampling factor is greater than 100 for at least one path.
Some path delay values are much greater than the input sample period, resulting in a long channel filter response.
The smallest path delay is much greater than the input sample period, which causes a negative channel filter delay.
The input for selected transmit antennas must have at least one 1.
The input for selected receive antennas must have at least one 1.
The signal input must be a double precision, real or complex, 2-dimensional matrix with the number of columns equal to the number of transmit antennas.

The input for selected transmit antennas must be a fixed-size, binary, row vector of length equal to the number of transmit antennas, or equivalently, the first dimension of the transmit correlation matrix.

The input for selected receive antennas must be a fixed-size, binary, row vector of length equal to the number of receive antennas, or equivalently, the first dimension of the receive correlation matrix.
Consider turning off transmit antenna selection for a fixed-size input signal.
PathsForDopplerDisplay must be no larger than the length of PathDelays.
Channel visualization is not supported in code generation.
Visualization is supported only when FadingTechnique is set to 'Filtered Gaussian noise'.
The INITIALTIME input must be a multiple of the reciprocal of the SampleRate property.
The InitialTime property must be a multiple of the reciprocal of the SampleRate property.
The INITIALTIME input must be greater than the last frame time.
DopplerSpectrum must be of Jakes type when FadingTechnique is set to Sum of sinusoids.
The INITIALTIME input must be a scalar.
